Headline: #55 Garfield Temporary Westbound Reroute near 55th/Wentworth
ShortDescription: Westbound 55 Garfield buses are temporarily rerouted via 55th, State, 51st, Lafayette, 55th and over regular route, due to street blockage near 55th/Wentworth.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #55 Garfield buses are temporarily rerouted via 55th, State, 51st, Lafayette, 55th and over regular route, due to street blockage near 55th/Wentworth.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
